channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Everstone combines Wingify, AB Tasty for $100M+ digital experience optimization platform
item.description: The combined business will serve more than 4,000 customers globally and surpass $100 million in annual revenue.

item.title: Meta’s Oversight Board takes up permanent bans in landmark case
item.description: For the first time, Meta's Oversight Board is looking for specific policy recommendations around disabled accounts.

item.title: Here are the 55 US AI startups that raised $100M or more in 2025
item.description: Last year was monumental for the AI industry in the U.S. and beyond. How will 2025 compare?

item.title: Well, there goes the metaverse!
item.description: The metaverse is on its last legs as VR is eclipsed by AI. But that's not the only thing that went wrong for Meta's VR ambitions.

item.title: Rogue agents and shadow AI: Why VCs are betting big on AI security
